price: Kuma yãyã zã ku karɓe shi alhãli kuwa, haƙĩƙa, sãshenku yã sãdu zuwa ga sãshe, kuma sun riƙi alkawari* mai kauri daga gare ku?
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ تَأۡخُذُونَهُۥ وَقَدۡ أَفۡضَىٰ بَعۡضُكُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ وَأَخَذۡنَ مِنكُم مِّيثَٰقًا غَلِيظٗا
footnotes: * Alkawarin riƙonsu da alheri ko kuma sallamarsu da kyautatãwa. Baƙara Ãya ta 231.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakayfa takhudhūnahu waqad afḍā baʿḍukum ilā baʿḍin wa-akhadhna minkum mīthāqan ghalīẓan
